page.title: 19A TYPICAL DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: {My Day by Stacey Swann.} On Friday mornings my Mum wakes me up at 7.30. I get dressed and go down stairs to have breakfast. I usually have an egg. Then I have a wash, clean my teeth, put on my shoes and go out to play. At 8.25 I go for the bus. When it comes I get out my Saver Strip and pay my fare. I sit next to Samantha Brooksbank and talk to her. When I arrive at school I put my bag by the gate and play rounders or tig with my friends until the bell goes at 9.00. Then we line up, go into school a class at a time, and put our coats and bags in the cloak room. Next we go into the classroom and get out our reading books. Our teacher takes the register and we give out the sum books. At 10.00 we have assembly, we sing a song and listen to a story.
